_header: Jesu that is most of might
_description: A letter to his Mistress — fourteen quatrains (abab)

BodRawC813.First Lines:
Iesue þat ys most of myghtand made man aboffe all
                    thyng…
BodRawC813.Last Lines:
…crystes dere blessyng and myneI sende yow yn grettyng of thys
                    letter
